meanings.sent1: The aliveness of the forest was evident in the chirping of birds.
meanings.sent2: She could feel the aliveness of the puppy as it wagged its tail.
meanings.sent3: The aliveness of the party made everyone dance with joy.
meanings.sent4: His eyes sparkled with aliveness as he talked about his passion for painting.
meanings.sent5: The aliveness of the garden was like a symphony of colors and scents.

meanings.definition: The quality of being full of life and energy.
meanings.sent1: The aliveness of the playground filled the children with laughter.
meanings.sent2: The dancer moved with aliveness and grace on the stage.
meanings.sent3: Her enthusiasm for the project brought an aliveness to the team.
meanings.sent4: The city pulsated with aliveness as people bustled about their day.
meanings.sent5: The aliveness of the ocean waves was invigorating to the soul.
